item.description:
Hello Trailblazers! We've decided to have a last minute bonfire party at my house in Durham, NH. So if you're looking for something to do tonight, please come join us!

We'll be outside but have access to the bathroom in the house. We have a large picnic table there but please bring your chairs and sit around the bonfire!

Party starts at 6 pm. Please do not bring any wood to burn--I have plenty. This is a BYO (Bring Your Own) party. We will have some food there, but bring anything you might like to eat or drink. And don't forget to bring a chair if you can.

Others are already planning to join us, so this event will take place even if no one RSVP's. Feel free to make a last minute decision and just show up!

It should be a nice clear, moonlit night--a great night for a bonfire!!

My house is actually on "30 Long Pond Road" which is right next to 12 Hampshire Ave. My road is brand new so it might not appear on someone's GPS or Mapquest.

Look for the tiki torches at the begining of the driveway.

If you have trouble finding the place, call me at 603- 312-6735.

See you there!

Peter

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Last minute Christmas Eve Bonfire!
